Successfully defend my PhD thesis with no correction. https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/post/viva/index/ Thu, 29 Aug 2024 15:21:54 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/post/viva/index/

Successfully defend my PhD thesis with no correction. My PhD thesis is titled as “Process-aware Pattern Recognition and Deviation Detection Under Uncertainty”. My PhD research focuses on leveraging domain-specific knowledge (processes) to enhance the performance and interpretability of machine learning models and handling uncertain and probabilistic data.

>>>>>>> master MicrothingsChain: Blockchain-based Controlled Data Sharing Platform in Multi-domain IoT https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/jnana/ Fri, 15 Jan 2021 20:34:29 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/jnana/ BC-RAN: Cloud radio access network enabled by blockchain for 5G https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/bc-ran-cloud-radio-access-network-enabled-by-blockchain-for-5g/ Thu, 01 Oct 2020 20:30:55 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/bc-ran-cloud-radio-access-network-enabled-by-blockchain-for-5g/ Decentralized and Secure Cross-Domain Data Sharing Scheme Based on Blockchain for Application-Centric IoT https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/jise/ Wed, 01 Jul 2020 20:31:45 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/jise/ Advanced Care & Research Center (ACRC) https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/acrc/ <<<<<<< HEAD Mon, 27 Apr 2020 04:00:00 +0000 ======= Mon, 27 Apr 2020 00:00:00 +0000 >>>>>>> master https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/acrc/

This research programme will develop practical, care-driven technologies that are fit for people in later life. In particular, this means exploring and developing data-driven IoT platforms that can produce accurate data about instant events (e.g. vital signs and serious incidents such as falls), short-term activities (e.g. those of daily living) and long-term pursuits (e.g. physical and mental activities over weeks and months) in order to extract (predictive) information and patterns that can be used, among other things, for effective interventions and the prevention of adverse outcomes.

This will develop digitised models of care to allow for meaningful understanding and decision support. This includes models that capture knowledge about care pathways, guidelines, and practices, as well as individual needs and circumstances. These will be used to inform the new models of care work package. Explainable models using AI on existing data to produce alerts and insights towards meaningful interventions. Finally, we will use these digital models to provide predictive performance measures under different circumstances and ageing population trends.

Partial-Equivalence: A Semantic Strategy in Service Composition and Modeling https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/partial-equivalence-a-semantic-strategy-in-service-composition-and-modeling/ Thu, 10 Oct 2019 20:35:51 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/partial-equivalence-a-semantic-strategy-in-service-composition-and-modeling/ QoS-Aware Path Finding and Load Balancing in Service-Composition https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/qos-aware-path-finding-and-load-balancing-in-service-composition/ Thu, 10 Oct 2019 20:33:03 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/qos-aware-path-finding-and-load-balancing-in-service-composition/ An Abnormal Transaction Detection Mechanim on Bitcoin https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/an-abnormal-transaction-detection-mechanim-on-bitcoin/ Thu, 10 Oct 2019 20:28:46 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/an-abnormal-transaction-detection-mechanim-on-bitcoin/ Trust-PBFT: a PeerTrust-based Practical Byzantine Consensus Algorithm https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/trust-pbft-a-peertrust-based-practical-byzantine-consensus-algorithm/ Thu, 10 Oct 2019 20:26:25 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/trust-pbft-a-peertrust-based-practical-byzantine-consensus-algorithm/ Blockchain-based secure digital asset exchange scheme with QoS-aware incentive mechanism https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/blockchain-based-secure-digital-asset-exchange-scheme-with-qos-aware-incentive-mechanism/ Sun, 26 May 2019 20:30:11 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/blockchain-based-secure-digital-asset-exchange-scheme-with-qos-aware-incentive-mechanism/ Trusted and controlled sharing technology and system of multi-domain IoT based on blockchain https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/blockchain-province/ Sat, 27 Apr 2019 00:00:00 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/blockchain-province/

The aim of this research programme is below:

  • Solving information isolation resulting from vertical IoT applications.

  • Establishing cross-domain authentication and access control mechanism.

  • Designing and developing data sharing and exchanging system.

MicrothingsChain: Edge Computing and Decentralized IoT Architecture Based on Blockchain for Cross-Domain Data Sharing https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/microthingchain/ Fri, 12 Oct 2018 00:00:00 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/publication/microthingchain/ Intelligent service transaction operation mechanism and performance optimization technology https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/blockchain-national/ Fri, 27 Apr 2018 00:00:00 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/blockchain-national/

This project aims to develope a intelligent service trasaction system based on crowd sourcing and blockchain technologiee so that it can meet the requirements of high performance and supervision.

In particular, we develope a service-oriented and high-precision service publishing and composition system. This enables end-users (e.g., individuals and companies) to publish their services and data in the blockchain as digital asset. This could also provide high-precision service recommendation and service composition regarding to the custimized functions.

We also investigate the approaches to improve the performance of blockchain by optimizing the consensus algorithms and sharding techniques.

A blockchain-based service trading mechanism and system is developed to enable decentralized services transactions on blockchain.

Comprehensive IoT access and service delivery platform and demonstration application https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/iot-province/ Thu, 27 Apr 2017 00:00:00 +0000 https://jia-wei-zheng.github.io/project/iot-province/

This research programme aims to realize these research goals:

  • Realizing adaptive access for heterogeneous IoT devices.

  • Designing distribute computing and data storage architecture.

  • Developing demonstration IoT application in industrial field.
